content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: warped_planks
inventory=[{"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 10}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 37, "index": 33}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_spawn_egg", "quantity": 11, "index": 35}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 64, "index": 42}]
thought: To craft warped_planks, I need to place stripped_warped_hyphae at slot 23 into the crafting grid.
act: move from slot 23 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: warped_planks
inventory=[{"type": "warped_planks", "quantity": 4, "index": 0}, {"type": "stripped_warped_hyphae", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "prismarine_brick_slab", "quantity": 6, "index": 10}, {"type": "zombie_horse_spawn_egg", "quantity": 37, "index": 33}, {"type": "wither_skeleton_spawn_egg", "quantity": 11, "index": 35}, {"type": "golden_apple", "quantity": 64, "index": 42}]
thought: The warped_planks have been crafted and need to be moved from the crafting slot 0 to an empty inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 4
